rhsm_log.title: rhsm log format
rhsm_log.description: Log format used by Red Hat Subscription Manager

sample.line: 2016-08-26 10:38:06,058 [DEBUG] yum:31581 @identity.py:131 - Loading consumer info from identity certificates.

2016-08-26 10:38:06,064 [INFO] yum:31581 @connection.py:778 - Connection built: http_proxy=proxy.example.com:3128 host=subscription.rhn.redhat.com port=443 handler=/subscription auth=identity_cert ca_dir=/etc/rhsm/ca/ verify=False
